item.title: EPISODE7-360 WIRED Live Interview With Xbox.com Community Leader Trixie
item.author: Alex.Gold@gamingtalkhq.com
item.description: We talk live with trixie the xbox.com community leader. Discussing the world cyber games,the gamerchix's and xbox ambassador program and more. Call in and ask her questions live. Then after the interview we go over the past week in Xbox News.
